title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 20 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 20 2022
description:
Clay, of Buck and Clay, gives "Bud & Trey's" excellent apology: A helpful listener points out to show hosts "Bud & Trey" that state of "gerrymandering" namesake was incorrectly reported. It's Massachusetts, not Maryland. Officer-involved shooting causes more Black Lives Matter protests in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Kari Lake, Arizona gubernatorial candidate and former news anchor, joins C&B to give an update on the invasion along the southern border and election security. Amazingly, our vice president, Kamala Harris, is amazed by space: "I think everyone here recognizes how extraordinary space is."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
